sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import GridMotion from '../components/GridMotion'; const PavementSigns: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Pavement signs images for GridMotion const pavementImages = Array.from({ length: 28 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/pavement-signs/pavement${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 60, scale: 0.9 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, duration: 1.2, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1 }, '-=0.7' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.5' ); }, []); const features = [ { title: 'A-Board Classics', description: 'Traditional wooden and metal A-boards with chalk or printed panels', icon: 'ðŸ“‹' }, { title: 'Swing Signs', description: 'Double-sided swing signs with weather-resistant graphics', icon: 'âš¡' }, { title: 'Poster Holders', description: 'Sleek aluminum frames with quick-change poster systems', icon: 'ðŸŽ¯' }, { title: 'Custom Shapes', description: 'Bespoke die-cut designs that stand out from the crowd', icon: 'âœ¨' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* GridMotion Background */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}
Footfall Drivers

PAVEMENT
SIGNS

Turn every passerby into a potential customer

Our pavement signs combine eye-catching design with robust construction, built to withstand British weather while delivering your message loud and clear.

View Options Request Quote
{/* Bottom Vignette */}
{/* Options Grid */}

Choose Your Style

From traditional to contemporary, we have the perfect pavement sign for your business

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* Benefits Section */}
{[ { stat: '100%', label: 'Weather Resistant' }, { stat: '24/7', label: 'Visibility' }, { stat: '5min', label: 'Setup Time' }, { stat: 'âˆž', label: 'Design Options' } ].map((item, idx) => (
{item.stat}
{item.label}
))}

Built to Last,
Made to Convert

{[ 'Heavy-duty construction resists wind and weather', 'Easy-change graphics for seasonal promotions', 'Reflective options for enhanced visibility', 'Compliant with local pavement signage regulations' ].map((point, idx) => (

{point}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Boost
Your Footfall?

Get a free design mockup and quote for your custom pavement sign

Get Free Quote View All Services
); }; export default PavementSigns;
